thread.title: Regal Kowloon Hotel dishes out themed coffee breaks
thread.title_full: Regal Kowloon Hotel dishes out themed coffee breaks

author: Hong Kong, August 13, 2015
title: Regal Kowloon Hotel dishes out themed coffee breaks
text:
Regal Kowloon Hotel dishes out themed coffee breaks Hong Kong, August 13, 2015 
A SERIES of seven new themed coffee breaks is now available to meeting planners who are taking their events to Regal Kowloon Hotel in Hong Kongâ€™s Tsimshatsui. 

The seven themes include Tropical Fever, which features tropical fruits dishes and Mixed Berries Smoothie; Vegetarian Refreshment, which offers a refreshing selection of greens; as well as five others that draw inspiration from Hong Kong, Japanese, English, Thai and Singaporean cuisine. 

To enjoy one of these fun concepts, meeting planners need only to upgrade their regular coffee break with a top up of HK$60 (US$7.80) per pax. A 10 per cent service charge applies.
